      • connect

        public boolean connect​(java.lang.String name,
                       int port,
                       QueueBroker.ConnectListener listener)
        Description copied from class: QueueBroker
        Connects to a broker on a specified port and returns a MessageQueue. This method is non-blocking and will return immediately. The MessageQueue will be set up to handle the connection once it is established.
        Specified by:
        connect in class QueueBroker
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the broker to connect to.
        port - The port on which to connect.
        Returns:
        The MessageQueue that is set up to handle the connection.
